* Contact: StefanoRivera
* Brand: HP
* Make : OmniBook
* Model: xe4500
* Website: http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/Home.jsp?prodSeriesId=83757&prodTypeId=12454
* S/N: Not a a Canonical supplied laptop

=== Current Issues (edgy) ===
* Suspend/Hibernate/Resume fails, because of screen corruption issues.
** Resumes with a corrupted screen (band of green vert bars at tap, a band of horizontal garbage bars, and a white band, rest of screen black)
** Can be sshed into for around a minute after booting, then dies - presume memory corruption....
* TV Out not available, fglrx isn't available for ATI Radeon Mobility M6
* No 3D acceleration
* Some special keys don't work
* IRDA doesn't work out of the box

=== Dapper Issues ===
* TV Out not available
* Corrupted widgets: Lots of buttons are covered with black dots.
* Some special keys don't work
* IRDA doesn't work out of the box
